job.title: Software Engineer (Entry Level)
job.description: Launcher is developing the worlds most efficient rocket to deliver small satellites to orbitltbrgtltbrgtWe are now headquartered in Hawthorne California map Please visit our careers page to learn more about Launchers strategy and benefitsltbrgtltbrgtThe Role Support ongoing propulsion testing and advance the development of our Avionics software platform for our products Launcher Engine2 Launcher Orbiter and Launcher LightltbrgtltbrgtCompensation Above average salary  company equity stock options  competitive benefitsltbrgtltbrgtStart date September 1 2021 or earlierltbrgtltbrgtLocation Hawthorne CAltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt The Following Software Development Roles Are Available ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtFlight computer role  Required skills C C Linux Kernel TCPIP Embedded SystemsltligtltligtGround system platform role  Required skills Web development including NodeJS InfluxDB Redis HTMLCSS Websocket Amazon Web Services Networking ltligtltligtTesting software role  Required skills National Instruments DAQs Labview Python or C TCPIP able to read hardware datasheets and schematicsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt Minimum Requirements ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in Computer Science or other engineering with strong software engineering experience or electivesltligtltulgtPlease specify your area of expertise and the US Government space technology export regulations including the International Traffic in Arms Regulations you must be a US citizen lawful permanent resident of the US protected individual as letterltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt Equal Opportunity ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtLauncher is an equal opportunity employer We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race color religion gender national
